title: Kerry In Iraq To Pressure Al-Maliki To Reach Across Sectarian Lines
teaser: As Sunni Militants continue to grab territory across Northern Iraq, the U.S. has been pressuring Iraqi Prime Minister Nouri al-Maliki to reach out to the Sunni and Kurdish communities.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
